metadata.Title: CVE-2012-0782 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities inwp-admin/setup-config.php in the installation component in WordPress 3.3.1and earlier allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTMLvia the (1) dbhost, (2) dbname, or (3) uname parameter. NOTE: the vendordisputes the significance of this issue; also, it is unclear whether thisspecific XSS scenario has security relevance.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
